home.heroTitle: Turn‑key vehicle importing for dealers and wholesalers
home.heroSubtitle: Korea is our core focus. We also source from Europe, the USA and China. Transparent logistics, strict vetting, fixed timelines.
home.legal: We work with businesses only: dealers and bulk buyers

step1.title: Brief & criteria
step1.desc: Make, mileage, year, budget, timing. Availability across KR/EU/US/CN.

step2.title: Sourcing & vetting
step2.desc: Inspection, photo/video, history, negotiation. We lock price and deadline.

step3.title: Logistics & clearance
step3.desc: Shipping, customs, certification. Handover in Russia with full paperwork.

home.eliteTitle: We work with a highly selected clientele
home.eliteDesc: KORT caps concurrent projects to protect quality and timing. We partner with dealers and distributors and manage each delivery personally.
